title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

cards.name: Avalanche Tusker
cards.text: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.
cards.flavor:
"Hold the high ground, then bring it to your enemy."
—Surrak, khan of the Temur

rulings.text: If the target creature can’t block Avalanche Tusker, but could block another attacking creature, it’s free to block that creature or block no creatures at all.

If, during the declare blockers step, the target creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block, then it doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature block, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If the player doesn’t, the creature doesn’t block in that case either.

cards.name: Riverwheel Aerialists
cards.text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: Adepts of the Riverwheel Stronghold can run through rain and never get wet; masters use the raindrops as stepping stones.

rulings.text: Any spell you cast that doesn’t have the type creature will cause prowess to trigger. If a spell has multiple types, and one of those types is creature (such as an artifact creature), casting it won’t cause prowess to trigger. Playing a land also won’t cause prowess to trigger.
Prowess goes on the stack on top of the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve before that spell.
Once it triggers, prowess isn’t connected to the spell that caused it to trigger. If that spell is countered, prowess will still resolve.

cards.name: Shambling Attendants
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor:
"Let the world behold what becomes of those who defy us."
—Taigam, Sidisi's Hand

rulings.text: The rules for delve have changed slightly since it was last in an expansion. Previously, delve reduced the cost to cast a spell. Under the current rules, you exile cards from your graveyard at the same time you pay the spell’s cost. Exiling a card this way is simply another way to pay that cost.
Delve doesn’t change a spell’s mana cost or converted mana cost. For example, Dead Drop’s converted mana cost is 10 even if you exiled three cards to cast it.
You can’t exile cards to pay for the colored mana requirements of a spell with delve.
You can’t exile more cards than the generic mana requirement of a spell with delve. For example, you can’t exile more than nine cards from your graveyard to cast Dead Drop.
Because delve isn’t an alternative cost, it can be used in conjunction with alternative costs.

cards.name: Monastery Flock
cards.text:
Defender, flying
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"The arrow strikes one bird down, but the flock remains."
—Jeskai teaching

rulings.text: If an attacking face-down Monastery Flock is turned face up, it will continue to be attacking even though it will have defender. If it’s turned face up before blockers are declared, then creatures without flying or reach won’t be able to block it.
Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

foreignNames.name: Acto de traición
foreignNames.text: Gana el control de la criatura objetivo hasta el final del turno. Endereza esa criatura. Gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "¡Los Sultai se llevan a nuestros muertos, así que nosotros tomaremos a sus vivos!". —Taklai, azuzadora de la ira mardu

foreignNames.name: Acte de trahison
foreignNames.text: Acquérez le contrôle de la créature ciblée jusqu'à la fin du tour. Dégagez cette créature. Elle acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: « Puisque les Sultaï prennent nos morts, nous nous approprierons leurs vivants ! » —Taklaï, chanterage marduen

foreignNames.name: Atto di Tradimento
foreignNames.text: Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio fino alla fine del turno. STAPpa quella creatura. Ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Se i Sultai rubano i nostri morti, noi prenderemo i loro vivi!" —Taklai, intonafuria Mardu

foreignNames.name: 反逆の行動
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それのコントロールを得る。そのクリーチャーをアンタップする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 「スゥルタイは我らの死者を取っていく。だから我々は奴らの生ある者を取る！」 ――マルドゥの憤怒歌い、タクライ

foreignNames.name: 반역 행위
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 턴종료까지 그 생물의 조종권을 얻는다. 그 생물은 언탭되며 턴종료까지 신속을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "술타이는 우리의 망자들을 지배하니, 우리는 그들의 산자들을 지배해야 한다!" —마르두 전쟁노래꾼 타클라이

foreignNames.name: Ato de Traição
foreignNames.text: Ganhe o controle da criatura alvo até o final do turno. Desvire aquela criatura. Ela ganha ímpeto até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Os Sultai levam nossos mortos, então temos que levar os vivos deles!" — Taklai, cantador do ódio Mardu

foreignNames.name: Акт Измены
foreignNames.text: Получите контроль над целевым существом до конца хода. Разверните то существо. Оно получает Ускорение до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: «Султайцы забрали наших мертвецов, а мы заберем их живых!» — Таклай, певец ярости Марду

foreignNames.name: 叛行
foreignNames.text: 获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「苏勒台夺我逝者，我们当以掠其生者为报！」 ～玛尔都咏怒者塔克莱

foreignNames.name: 叛行
foreignNames.text: 獲得目標生物的操控權直到回合結束。重置該生物。它獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「蘇勒台奪我逝者，我們當以掠其生者為報！」 ～瑪爾都詠怒者塔克萊

cards.originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Scout the Borders
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"I am in my element: the element of surprise."
—Mogai, Sultai scout

foreignNames.name: Das Grenzland ausspähen
foreignNames.text: Zeige die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek offen vor. Du kannst davon eine Kreaturen- oder Länderkarte auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich lebe den Moment: den Moment der Überraschung." —Mogai, Späher der Sultai

foreignNames.name: Explorar las fronteras
foreignNames.text: Muestra las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner en tu mano una carta de criatura o de tierra que se encuentre entre ellas. Pon el resto en tu cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Estoy en mi elemento: el elemento sorpresa". —Mogai, explorador sultai

foreignNames.name: Patrouiller aux frontières
foreignNames.text: Révélez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre une carte de créature ou de terrain parmi elles dans votre main. Mettez le reste dans votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je suis dans mon élément : l'élément de surprise. » —Mogaï, éclaireur sultaï

foreignNames.name: Perlustrare i Confini
foreignNames.text: Rivela le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi aggiungere alla tua mano una carta creatura o terra scelta tra esse. Metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sono nel mio elemento naturale: l'elemento sorpresa." —Mogai, esploratore Sultai

foreignNames.name: 境界の偵察
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを公開する。あなたは、それらの中にあるクリーチャー・カードか土地・カードを１枚あなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたの墓地に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「ここは我が領域。奇襲の舞台だ。」 ――スゥルタイの斥候、モガイ

foreignNames.name: 변방 정찰
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 공개한다. 당신은 그 중 생물 또는 대지 카드 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드는 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "남을 놀라게 하는 것은 내 전문 분야이다." —술타이 정찰병 모가이

foreignNames.name: Explorar as Fronteiras
foreignNames.text: Revele os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar um card de criatura ou terreno dentre eles em sua mão. Coloque o restante em seu cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu estou no meu elemento: o elemento surpresa." — Mogai, batedor Sultai

foreignNames.name: Разведка на Границе
foreignNames.text: Покажите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить находящуюся среди них карту существа или земли в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты на ваше кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: «Я в своей стихии — стихии неожиданности». — Могай, султайский разведчик

foreignNames.name: 探查边境
foreignNames.text: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以将其中一张生物或地牌置入你手上。将其余牌置入你的坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 「这正是我的拿手好戏：骇人大戏。」 ～苏勒台斥候毛盖

foreignNames.name: 探查邊境
foreignNames.text: 展示你牌庫頂的五張牌。你可以將其中一張生物或地牌置入你手上。將其餘牌置入你的墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 「這正是我的拿手好戲：駭人大戲。」 ～蘇勒台斥候毛蓋

cards.originalText: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

cards.name: Woolly Loxodon
cards.text: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

foreignNames.name: Wollloxodon
foreignNames.text: Morph {5}{G} (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
foreignNames.flavor: Selbst unter den zähesten Kriegern der Temur wird den Loxodons für ihre Anpassung an den Schnee der Berge Respekt gezollt.

foreignNames.name: Loxodón lanudo
foreignNames.text: Metamorfosis {5}{G}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
foreignNames.flavor: Incluso entre los guerreros más feroces de los Temur, los loxodones cuentan con gran respeto por su gran capacidad de adaptación a las nieves de las montañas.

foreignNames.name: Loxodon laineux
foreignNames.text: Mue {5}{G} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
foreignNames.flavor: Même les plus hardis des guerriers temuriens respectent les loxodons et leur capacité d'adaptation au climat neigeux des montagnes.

foreignNames.name: Lossodonte Lanuto
foreignNames.text: Metamorfosi {5}{G} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
foreignNames.flavor: Persino tra i più vigorosi guerrieri dei Temur, i lossodonti sono rispettati per la loro capacità di adattarsi alle nevi montane.

foreignNames.name: 長毛ロクソドン
foreignNames.text: 変異{5}{G}（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 象・戦士
foreignNames.flavor: その山の雪への対応力により、ロクソドンはティムールの最も頑強な戦士たちからも尊敬されている。

foreignNames.name: 털복숭이 록소돈
foreignNames.text: 변이 {5}{G} (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 테무르 개척민의 가장 강인한 전사들조차 설산에 적응한 록소돈에 경의를 표했다.

foreignNames.name: Loxodonte Lanoso
foreignNames.text: Metamorfose {5}{G} (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
foreignNames.flavor: Mesmo entre os guerreiros Temur mais resistentes, os loxodontes são respeitados por sua adaptação às montanhas nevadas.

foreignNames.name: Мохнатый Локсодон
foreignNames.text: Оборотень {5}{G} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
foreignNames.flavor: Даже среди самых выносливых воинов Темура локсодоны пользуются уважением за то, как они приспособились к жизни среди снежных вершин.

foreignNames.name: 粗茸象族
foreignNames.text: 变身{5}{G}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 就连铁木尔最耐寒的战士，也对能够适应山地暴雪的象族带有几分敬意。

foreignNames.name: 粗茸象族
foreignNames.text: 變身{5}{G}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 就連鐵木爾最耐寒的戰士，也對能夠適應山地暴雪的象族帶有幾分敬意。

cards.originalText: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.title: The cards schema
cards.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

examples.name: Avalanche Tusker
examples.text: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.
examples.flavor:
"Hold the high ground, then bring it to your enemy."
—Surrak, khan of the Temur

rulings.text: If the target creature can’t block Avalanche Tusker, but could block another attacking creature, it’s free to block that creature or block no creatures at all.

If, during the declare blockers step, the target creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block, then it doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature block, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If the player doesn’t, the creature doesn’t block in that case either.

foreignNames.name: Lawinenbulle
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Lawinenbulle angreift, blockt ihn in diesem Kampf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die der verteidigende Spieler kontrolliert, falls möglich.
foreignNames.flavor: „Was ist tödlicher für den Feind — die Lawine, oder was sie ausgelöst hat?" —Surrak, Khan der Temur

foreignNames.name: Colmilludo de la avalancha
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Colmilludo de la avalancha ataque, la criatura objetivo que controla el jugador defensor bloquea este combate si puede.
foreignNames.flavor: "Mantengan la posición elevada y luego atraigan allí al enemigo". —Surrak, kan de los Temur

foreignNames.name: Terrocorne des avalanches
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Terrocorne des avalanches attaque, une créature ciblée que le joueur défenseur contrôle le bloque pendant ce combat si possible.
foreignNames.flavor: « Occupez le terrain, puis projetez-le sur votre ennemi. » —Surrak, khan des Temur

foreignNames.name: Zannuto delle Valanghe
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta lo Zannuto delle Valanghe attacca, una creatura bersaglio controllata dal giocatore in difesa lo blocca in questo combattimento, se può farlo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non cedete suolo al nemico, se non facendoglielo precipitare addosso." —Surrak, khan dei Temur

foreignNames.name: なだれの大牙獣
foreignNames.text: なだれの大牙獣が攻撃するたび、防御プレイヤーのコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。この戦闘で、それは可能ならこれをブロックする。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 象・戦士
foreignNames.flavor: 「高地を維持し、そして敵に向かって一気に攻勢をかける。」 ――ティムールのカン、スーラク

foreignNames.name: 눈사태 엄니전사
foreignNames.text: 눈사태 엄니전사가 공격할 때마다, 수비플레이어가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 가능하면 이 전투에서 눈사태 엄니전사를 방어한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "고지를 점령한 후, 언덕과 함께 내려가며 적들을 섬멸하라." —테무르의 칸 서락

foreignNames.name: Dentudo da Avalanche
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Dentudo da Avalanche ataca, a criatura alvo controlada pelo jogador defensor o bloqueia neste combate se estiver apta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Domine a posição elevada. Depois, leve-a até seu inimigo." — Surrak, khan dos Temur

foreignNames.name: Лавинный Бивень
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Лавинный Бивень атакует, целевое существо под контролем защищающегося игрока блокирует его в этом бою, если может.
foreignNames.flavor: «Займите высоту, а затем обрушьте ее на врага». — Суррак, хан Темура

foreignNames.name: 崩击獠象
foreignNames.text: 每当崩击獠象攻击时，目标由防御牌手操控的生物本次战斗中若能阻挡它，则必须如此作。
foreignNames.flavor: 「占据有利地势，将敌人一举击溃。」 ～铁木尔可汗苏拉克

foreignNames.name: 崩擊獠象
foreignNames.text: 每當崩擊獠象攻擊時，目標由防禦玩家操控的生物本次戰鬥中若能阻擋它，則必須如此作。
foreignNames.flavor: 「佔據有利地勢，將敵人一舉擊潰。」 ～鐵木爾可汗蘇拉克

examples.originalText: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.

examples.name: Warden of the Eye
examples.text: When Warden of the Eye enters the battlefield, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.
examples.flavor: The wardens guard the sacred documents of Tarkir's history, though they are forbidden to read the words.

foreignNames.name: Hüter des Auges
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Hüter des Auges ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Nichtkreatur-Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Hüter bewachen die heiligen Dokumente der Geschichte Tarkirs, doch es ist ihnen untersagt, die Worte zu lesen.

foreignNames.name: Protector del ojo
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Protector del ojo entre al campo de batalla, regresa la carta objetivo que no sea de criatura y que no sea de tierra de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Los protectores custodian los documentos sagrados de la historia de Tarkir, aunque tienen prohibido leer su texto.

foreignNames.name: Garde de l'Œil
foreignNames.text: Quand le Garde de l'Œil arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez une carte non-créature, non-terrain ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: Les gardes protègent les documents sacrés de l'histoire de Tarkir, mais en lire le contenu leur est interdit.

foreignNames.name: Guardiano dell'Occhio
foreignNames.text: Quando il Guardiano dell'Occhio entra nel campo di battaglia, riprendi in mano una carta non creatura, non terra bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: I guardiani vegliano sui documenti sacri della storia di Tarkir, ma è fatto loro divieto di leggerne le parole.

foreignNames.name: 眼の管理人
foreignNames.text: 眼の管理人が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャーでも土地でもないカード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ジン・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 管理人はタルキールの歴史が記された神聖なる文書を守っているが、それらは読むことを禁じられている。

foreignNames.name: 눈의 수호자
foreignNames.text: 눈의 수호자가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물이 아니고 대지가 아닌 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 비록 읽는 것은 금지되었지만, 수호자들은 타르커의 역사가 담긴 성서를 지킨다.

foreignNames.name: Guardião do Olho
foreignNames.text: Quando Guardião do Olho entrar no campo de batalha, devolva o card que não seja terreno ou criatura alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: Os guardiões protegem os documentos sagrados da história de Tarkir, mas são proibidos de lê-los.

foreignNames.name: Страж Ока
foreignNames.text: Когда Страж Ока выходит на поле битвы, верните целевую не являющуюся существом или землей карту из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: Стражи охраняют священные документы об истории Таркира, но им запрещено читать слова.

foreignNames.name: 慧眼护卫
foreignNames.text: 当慧眼护卫进战场时，将目标非生物且非地的牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 护卫看守着鞑契历史的神圣档案，但是他们禁止阅读其中的文字。

foreignNames.name: 慧眼護衛
foreignNames.text: 當慧眼護衛進戰場時，將目標非生物且非地的牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 護衛看守著韃契歷史的神聖檔案，但是他們禁止閱讀其中的文字。

examples.originalText: When Warden of the Eye enters the battlefield, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

examples.flavor:
"Hold the high ground, then bring it to your enemy."
—Surrak, khan of the Temur

rulings.text: If the target creature can’t block Avalanche Tusker, but could block another attacking creature, it’s free to block that creature or block no creatures at all.

If, during the declare blockers step, the target creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block, then it doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature block, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If the player doesn’t, the creature doesn’t block in that case either.

foreignNames.name: Lawinenbulle
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Lawinenbulle angreift, blockt ihn in diesem Kampf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die der verteidigende Spieler kontrolliert, falls möglich.
foreignNames.flavor: „Was ist tödlicher für den Feind — die Lawine, oder was sie ausgelöst hat?" —Surrak, Khan der Temur

foreignNames.name: Colmilludo de la avalancha
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Colmilludo de la avalancha ataque, la criatura objetivo que controla el jugador defensor bloquea este combate si puede.
foreignNames.flavor: "Mantengan la posición elevada y luego atraigan allí al enemigo". —Surrak, kan de los Temur

foreignNames.name: Terrocorne des avalanches
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Terrocorne des avalanches attaque, une créature ciblée que le joueur défenseur contrôle le bloque pendant ce combat si possible.
foreignNames.flavor: « Occupez le terrain, puis projetez-le sur votre ennemi. » —Surrak, khan des Temur

foreignNames.name: Zannuto delle Valanghe
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta lo Zannuto delle Valanghe attacca, una creatura bersaglio controllata dal giocatore in difesa lo blocca in questo combattimento, se può farlo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non cedete suolo al nemico, se non facendoglielo precipitare addosso." —Surrak, khan dei Temur

foreignNames.name: なだれの大牙獣
foreignNames.text: なだれの大牙獣が攻撃するたび、防御プレイヤーのコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。この戦闘で、それは可能ならこれをブロックする。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 象・戦士
foreignNames.flavor: 「高地を維持し、そして敵に向かって一気に攻勢をかける。」 ――ティムールのカン、スーラク

foreignNames.name: 눈사태 엄니전사
foreignNames.text: 눈사태 엄니전사가 공격할 때마다, 수비플레이어가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 가능하면 이 전투에서 눈사태 엄니전사를 방어한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "고지를 점령한 후, 언덕과 함께 내려가며 적들을 섬멸하라." —테무르의 칸 서락

foreignNames.name: Dentudo da Avalanche
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Dentudo da Avalanche ataca, a criatura alvo controlada pelo jogador defensor o bloqueia neste combate se estiver apta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Domine a posição elevada. Depois, leve-a até seu inimigo." — Surrak, khan dos Temur

foreignNames.name: Лавинный Бивень
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Лавинный Бивень атакует, целевое существо под контролем защищающегося игрока блокирует его в этом бою, если может.
foreignNames.flavor: «Займите высоту, а затем обрушьте ее на врага». — Суррак, хан Темура

foreignNames.name: 崩击獠象
foreignNames.text: 每当崩击獠象攻击时，目标由防御牌手操控的生物本次战斗中若能阻挡它，则必须如此作。
foreignNames.flavor: 「占据有利地势，将敌人一举击溃。」 ～铁木尔可汗苏拉克

foreignNames.name: 崩擊獠象
foreignNames.text: 每當崩擊獠象攻擊時，目標由防禦玩家操控的生物本次戰鬥中若能阻擋它，則必須如此作。
foreignNames.flavor: 「佔據有利地勢，將敵人一舉擊潰。」 ～鐵木爾可汗蘇拉克

examples.originalText: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.

examples.text: If the target creature can’t block Avalanche Tusker, but could block another attacking creature, it’s free to block that creature or block no creatures at all.

If, during the declare blockers step, the target creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block, then it doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature block, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If the player doesn’t, the creature doesn’t block in that case either.

examples.name: Warden of the Eye
examples.text: When Warden of the Eye enters the battlefield, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.
examples.flavor: The wardens guard the sacred documents of Tarkir's history, though they are forbidden to read the words.

foreignNames.name: Hüter des Auges
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Hüter des Auges ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Nichtkreatur-Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Hüter bewachen die heiligen Dokumente der Geschichte Tarkirs, doch es ist ihnen untersagt, die Worte zu lesen.

foreignNames.name: Protector del ojo
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Protector del ojo entre al campo de batalla, regresa la carta objetivo que no sea de criatura y que no sea de tierra de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Los protectores custodian los documentos sagrados de la historia de Tarkir, aunque tienen prohibido leer su texto.

foreignNames.name: Garde de l'Œil
foreignNames.text: Quand le Garde de l'Œil arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez une carte non-créature, non-terrain ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: Les gardes protègent les documents sacrés de l'histoire de Tarkir, mais en lire le contenu leur est interdit.

foreignNames.name: Guardiano dell'Occhio
foreignNames.text: Quando il Guardiano dell'Occhio entra nel campo di battaglia, riprendi in mano una carta non creatura, non terra bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: I guardiani vegliano sui documenti sacri della storia di Tarkir, ma è fatto loro divieto di leggerne le parole.

foreignNames.name: 眼の管理人
foreignNames.text: 眼の管理人が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャーでも土地でもないカード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ジン・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 管理人はタルキールの歴史が記された神聖なる文書を守っているが、それらは読むことを禁じられている。

foreignNames.name: 눈의 수호자
foreignNames.text: 눈의 수호자가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물이 아니고 대지가 아닌 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 비록 읽는 것은 금지되었지만, 수호자들은 타르커의 역사가 담긴 성서를 지킨다.

foreignNames.name: Guardião do Olho
foreignNames.text: Quando Guardião do Olho entrar no campo de batalha, devolva o card que não seja terreno ou criatura alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: Os guardiões protegem os documentos sagrados da história de Tarkir, mas são proibidos de lê-los.

foreignNames.name: Страж Ока
foreignNames.text: Когда Страж Ока выходит на поле битвы, верните целевую не являющуюся существом или землей карту из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: Стражи охраняют священные документы об истории Таркира, но им запрещено читать слова.

foreignNames.name: 慧眼护卫
foreignNames.text: 当慧眼护卫进战场时，将目标非生物且非地的牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 护卫看守着鞑契历史的神圣档案，但是他们禁止阅读其中的文字。

foreignNames.name: 慧眼護衛
foreignNames.text: 當慧眼護衛進戰場時，將目標非生物且非地的牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 護衛看守著韃契歷史的神聖檔案，但是他們禁止閱讀其中的文字。

examples.name: Despise
examples.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.
examples.flavor:
"You have returned from fire, traitor. This time I will see you leave as ashes."
—Zurgo, to Sarkhan Vol

foreignNames.name: Verachten
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Kreaturen- oder Planeswalkerkarte. Dieser Spieler wirft diese Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: „Du bist aus dem Feuer zurückgekehrt, Verräter. Diesmal wirst du diesen Ort als Asche verlassen." —Zurgo zu Sarkhan Vol

foreignNames.name: Despreciar
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta de criatura o de planeswalker. Ese jugador descarta esa carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Has regresado del fuego, traidor. Esta vez te veré partir hecho cenizas". —Zurgo, a Sarkhan Vol

foreignNames.name: Dédain
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte de créature ou de planeswalker. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Traître, le feu ne t'a pas consumé. Cette fois, je vais m'assurer que tu ne laisses que des cendres. » —Zurgo, à Sarkhan Vol

foreignNames.name: Disdegnare
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta creatura o planeswalker da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Hai fatto ritorno dal fuoco, traditore. Stavolta mi assicurerò che ad andarsene siano le tue ceneri." —Zurgo, a Sarkhan Vol

foreignNames.name: 蔑み
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中からクリーチャー・カード１枚かプレインズウォーカー・カード１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「炎から再び戻ったか、裏切り者よ。今度は貴様が灰となって去るのを見届けてやろう。」 ――ズルゴ、サルカン・ヴォルに対し

foreignNames.name: 경멸
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그 중 생물이나 플레인즈워커 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: "배신자여, 용케 불에서 살아 돌아왔구나. 이번엔 네가 재가 되어 바스러지는 모습을 지켜볼 것이다." —주르고가 사르칸 볼에게

foreignNames.name: Desprezar
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card de criatura ou planeswalker dela. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Você retornou do fogo, traidor. Desta vez, farei com que você parta como cinzas." — Zurgo, para Sarkhan Vol

foreignNames.name: Презирать
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту существа или planeswalker-а. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ты вернулся из огня, предатель. На этот раз я прослежу, чтобы от тебя остался лишь пепел». — Зурго, обращаясь к Сархану Волю

foreignNames.name: 鄙视
foreignNames.text: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张生物或鹏洛客牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「叛徒，那场大火也没能把你烧死。这次我一定要把你化作灰烬。」 ～珠高怒斥萨坎沃

foreignNames.name: 鄙視
foreignNames.text: 目標對手展示其手牌。你選擇其中一張生物或鵬洛客牌。該玩家棄掉該牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「叛徒，那場大火也沒能把你燒死。這次我一定要把你化作灰燼。」 ～珠高怒斥薩坎沃

examples.originalText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.

examples.name: Defiant Strike
examples.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
examples.flavor:
"Stand where the whole battle can see you. Strike so they'll never forget."
—Anafenza, khan of the Abzan

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Defiant Strike tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve. You won’t draw a card.

foreignNames.name: Trutziger Schlag
foreignNames.text:
Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Stellt euch auf, wo euch das ganze Schlachtfeld sehen kann. Schlagt so zu, dass sie es nie vergessen werden." —Anafenza, Khan der Abzan

foreignNames.name: Golpe desafiante
foreignNames.text:
La criatura objetivo obtiene +1/+0 hasta el final del turno.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sitúate donde todos los combatientes te vean. Ataca de forma que jamás lo olviden". —Anafenza, kan de los Abzan

foreignNames.name: Frappe provocatrice
foreignNames.text:
La créature ciblée gagne +1/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Tiens-toi là où tous les combattants pourront te voir. Et frappe afin qu'ils n'oublient jamais. » —Anafenza, khan des Abzans

foreignNames.name: Colpo Sprezzante
foreignNames.text:
Una creatura bersaglio prende +1/+0 fino alla fine del turno.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ergiti così che l'intero campo di battaglia possa vederti. Colpisci così che nessuno possa mai dimenticare." —Anafenza, khan degli Abzan

foreignNames.name: 果敢な一撃
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは＋１/＋０の修整を受ける。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「戦場にいる者すべてから見える場所に立て。そして全員が忘れぬような一撃を振るえ。」 ――アブザンのカン、アナフェンザ

foreignNames.name: 반항의 일격
foreignNames.text:
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 +1/+0을 받는다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "전 병력이 너를 볼 수 있는 장소에 서서 절대 잊지 못할 일격을 내리쳐라." —아브잔의 칸 아나펜자

foreignNames.name: Golpe Desafiador
foreignNames.text:
A criatura alvo recebe +1/+0 até o final do turno.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Fique onde todos na batalha possam vê-lo. Ataque de modo que eles nunca se esqueçam." — Anafenza, khan dos Abzan

foreignNames.name: Дерзкий Удар
foreignNames.text:
Целевое существо получает +1/+0 до конца хода.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Стой там, где все сражающиеся увидят тебя. Бей так, чтобы это запомнили навсегда». — Анафенза, хан Абзана

foreignNames.name: 无畏挥击
foreignNames.text:
目标生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「于战场中心奋勇拼杀。让敌人闻风丧胆。」 ～阿布赞可汗阿娜芬札

foreignNames.name: 無畏揮擊
foreignNames.text:
目標生物得+1/+0直到回合結束。
抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「於戰場中心奮勇拼殺。讓敵人聞風喪膽。」 ～阿布贊可汗阿娜芬札

examples.name: Monastery Flock
examples.text:
Defender, flying
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
examples.flavor:
"The arrow strikes one bird down, but the flock remains."
—Jeskai teaching

rulings.text: If an attacking face-down Monastery Flock is turned face up, it will continue to be attacking even though it will have defender. If it’s turned face up before blockers are declared, then creatures without flying or reach won’t be able to block it.
Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

foreignNames.name: Klosterschwarm
foreignNames.text:
Verteidiger, Fliegend
Morph {U} (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Der Pfeil bringt einen Vogel zu Fall, doch der Schwarm bleibt." —Lehre der Jeskai

foreignNames.name: Parvada del monasterio
foreignNames.text:
Defensor, vuela.
Metamorfosis {U}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
foreignNames.flavor: "La flecha abate un ave, pero la bandada prevalece". —Enseñanza jeskai

foreignNames.name: Nuée du monastère
foreignNames.text:
Défenseur, vol
Mue {U} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
foreignNames.flavor: « La flèche abat un oiseau, mais la nuée est toujours là. » —Enseignement jeskaï

foreignNames.name: Stormo del Monastero
foreignNames.text:
Difensore, volare
Metamorfosi {U} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
foreignNames.flavor: "La freccia può abbattere un uccello, ma lo stormo resta." —Insegnamento Jeskai

foreignNames.name: 僧院の群れ
foreignNames.text:
防衛、飛行
変異{U}（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「矢によって１羽の鳥が射落とされても、群れはそのまま残る。」 ――ジェスカイの教え

foreignNames.name: 사원의 새떼
foreignNames.text:
수비태세, 비행
변이 {U} (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "새 한 마리가 화살에 맞아 떨어지더라도 그 무리는 건재하다." —제스카이의 가르침

foreignNames.name: Revoada do Monastério
foreignNames.text:
Defensor, voar
Metamorfose {U} (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
foreignNames.flavor: "A flecha derruba uma ave, mas a revoada prossegue." —Ensinamento Jeskai

foreignNames.name: Монастырская Стая
foreignNames.text:
Защитник, Полет
Оборотень {U} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Стрела убивает одну птицу, но стая остается». — учения Джеская

foreignNames.name: 寺院鸟群
foreignNames.text:
守军，飞行
变身{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「只箭伤落羽，无力撼集群。」 ～洁斯凯教谕

foreignNames.name: 寺院鳥群
foreignNames.text:
守軍，飛行
變身{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「隻箭傷落羽，無力撼集群。」 ～潔斯凱教諭

examples.name: Whirlwind Adept
examples.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

rulings.text: Any spell you cast that doesn’t have the type creature will cause prowess to trigger. If a spell has multiple types, and one of those types is creature (such as an artifact creature), casting it won’t cause prowess to trigger. Playing a land also won’t cause prowess to trigger.
Prowess goes on the stack on top of the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve before that spell.
Once it triggers, prowess isn’t connected to the spell that caused it to trigger. If that spell is countered, prowess will still resolve.

foreignNames.name: Eingeweihte des Wirbelwinds
foreignNames.text:
Fluchsicher (Diese Kreatur kann nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein, die deine Gegner kontrollieren.)
Bravour (Immer wenn du einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch wirkst, erhält diese Kreatur +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.)

foreignNames.name: Discípula de los torbellinos
foreignNames.text:
Antimaleficio. (Esta criatura no puede ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades que controlan tus oponentes.)
Destreza. (Siempre que lances un hechizo que no sea de criatura, esta criatura obtiene +1/+1 hasta el final del turno.)

foreignNames.name: Adepte du tourbillon
foreignNames.text:
Défense talismanique (Cette créature ne peut pas être la cible de sorts ou de capacités que vos adversaires contrôlent.)
Prouesse (À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort non-créature, cette créature gagne +1/+1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.)

foreignNames.name: Esperta dei Turbini
foreignNames.text:
Anti-malocchio (Questa creatura non può essere bersaglio di magie o abilità controllate dai tuoi avversari.)
Prodezza (Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia non creatura, questa creatura prende +1/+1 fino alla fine del turno.)

foreignNames.name: 旋風の達人
foreignNames.text:
呪禁（このクリーチャーは、対戦相手がコントロールする呪文や能力の対象にならない。）
果敢（あなたがクリーチャーでない呪文を１つ唱えるたび、ターン終了時まで、このクリーチャーは＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ジン・モンク

foreignNames.name: 회오리바람 조작술사
foreignNames.text:
방호 (이 생물은 당신의 상대들이 조종하는 주문이나 능력의 목표로 정해질 수 없다.)
기량 (당신이 생물이 아닌 주문을 발동할 때마다, 이 생물은 턴종료까지 +1/+1을 받는다.)

foreignNames.name: Adepto do Redemoinho
foreignNames.text:
Resistência a magia (Esta criatura não pode ser alvo de mágicas nem de habilidades que seus oponentes controlam.)
Destreza (Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica que não seja de criatura, esta criatura recebe +1/+1 até o final do turno.)

foreignNames.name: Адепт Вихря
foreignNames.text:
Порчеустойчивость (Это существо не может быть целью заклинаний или способностей под контролем ваших оппонентов.)
Искусность (Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете не являющееся существом заклинание, это существо получает +1/+1 до конца хода.)

foreignNames.name: 旋风高手
foreignNames.text:
辟邪（此生物不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）
灵技（每当你施放非生物咒语时，此生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

foreignNames.name: 旋風高手
foreignNames.text:
辟邪（此生物不能成為由對手所操控之咒語或異能的目標。）
靈技（每當你施放非生物咒語時，此生物得+1/+1直到回合結束。）

examples.name: Scout the Borders
examples.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
examples.flavor:
"I am in my element: the element of surprise."
—Mogai, Sultai scout

foreignNames.name: Das Grenzland ausspähen
foreignNames.text: Zeige die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek offen vor. Du kannst davon eine Kreaturen- oder Länderkarte auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich lebe den Moment: den Moment der Überraschung." —Mogai, Späher der Sultai

foreignNames.name: Explorar las fronteras
foreignNames.text: Muestra las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner en tu mano una carta de criatura o de tierra que se encuentre entre ellas. Pon el resto en tu cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Estoy en mi elemento: el elemento sorpresa". —Mogai, explorador sultai

foreignNames.name: Patrouiller aux frontières
foreignNames.text: Révélez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre une carte de créature ou de terrain parmi elles dans votre main. Mettez le reste dans votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je suis dans mon élément : l'élément de surprise. » —Mogaï, éclaireur sultaï

foreignNames.name: Perlustrare i Confini
foreignNames.text: Rivela le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi aggiungere alla tua mano una carta creatura o terra scelta tra esse. Metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sono nel mio elemento naturale: l'elemento sorpresa." —Mogai, esploratore Sultai

foreignNames.name: 境界の偵察
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを公開する。あなたは、それらの中にあるクリーチャー・カードか土地・カードを１枚あなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたの墓地に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「ここは我が領域。奇襲の舞台だ。」 ――スゥルタイの斥候、モガイ

foreignNames.name: 변방 정찰
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 공개한다. 당신은 그 중 생물 또는 대지 카드 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드는 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "남을 놀라게 하는 것은 내 전문 분야이다." —술타이 정찰병 모가이

foreignNames.name: Explorar as Fronteiras
foreignNames.text: Revele os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar um card de criatura ou terreno dentre eles em sua mão. Coloque o restante em seu cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu estou no meu elemento: o elemento surpresa." — Mogai, batedor Sultai

foreignNames.name: Разведка на Границе
foreignNames.text: Покажите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить находящуюся среди них карту существа или земли в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты на ваше кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: «Я в своей стихии — стихии неожиданности». — Могай, султайский разведчик

foreignNames.name: 探查边境
foreignNames.text: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以将其中一张生物或地牌置入你手上。将其余牌置入你的坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 「这正是我的拿手好戏：骇人大戏。」 ～苏勒台斥候毛盖

foreignNames.name: 探查邊境
foreignNames.text: 展示你牌庫頂的五張牌。你可以將其中一張生物或地牌置入你手上。將其餘牌置入你的墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 「這正是我的拿手好戲：駭人大戲。」 ～蘇勒台斥候毛蓋
